name: Cooper Run App
description: React front-end connected to Rails API, TDD with RSpec and Cypress

name: Greta's Greens
description: Developed with Rails, An Owner can create a menu, so visiting guests may place an order. Authentication with Devise, feature tests with Cucumber and unit tests with Rspec.

name: Rails Article Application
description: Minimally styled Rails application, Devise Authentication, Pundit authorization. Cucumber and Rspec TDD.

name: Address Book
description: Browser based address book to store contacts. Written in javaScript, feature tests Cucumber.

name: Rock Paper Scissors in React
description: Using React to build a simple game of Rock Paper Scissors vs a randomly generated computer choice. Testing with cypress
